properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Little River Inlet to Murrells Inlet SC out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Murrells Inlet to South Santee River SC out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Cape Fear NC to Little River Inlet SC out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Surf City to Cape Fear NC out 20 nm
properties.headline: Marine Weather Statement issued February 11 at 9:07PM EST by NWS Wilmington NC
properties.description:
Low astronomical tides early Wed morning along the Southeast NC
and Northeast SC coasts will drop to levels around -1.40 ft MLLW.
This will occur between 2 am and 5 am, with low tide occurring
around 330 am EST. For a Low Water Advisory, levels have to drop
to less than or equal to -2.00 ft MLLW.

Mariners should use extra caution while navigating close to shore
and thru area inlets, keeping a watch out for exposed sandbars
and shoaling. It's best to remain in the channel when navigating
along the IntraCoastal Waterway and follow the local aids to
navigation. A Depthfinder, a strong SpotLight and slow going are
recommended when navigating close to shore and the inland
waterways. In addition, allow extra mooring to counter the low
water levels.

NWSheadline: Early Wed Low Tide Water Levels to Bottom at -1.40 ft MLLW
